case_title: Raja Khalid Gulzar And Others vs Secretary Colonies, Board of Revenue, Government of the Punjab And Others
respondent: Secretary Colonies, Board of Revenue, Government of the Punjab And Others

facts.lease_allocation: Land allotted for ten years under Animal Breeding Conditions by Ministry of Defence.
facts.lease_termination: Lease terminated on 27-2-1995 by Ministry of Defence.

legal_proceedings.result: Case remanded to Deputy Commissioner, Sargodha.
Respondents restrained from dispossessing petitioners until compensation paid.

key_issues.lease_expiry: Lease expired and land reverted to State under Condition No. 50-A.
key_issues.notice_requirement: Whether notice under Section 24 of Colonization of Government Lands (Punjab) Act, 1912 was required.
key_issues.performance_review: Petitioners claim performance during lease period was in accordance with terms.

actions: Directed Executive Engineer Buildings to assess building value for compensation.
Rejected petitioners' request to adjourn case sine die.

next_steps.remand_instructions: Case remanded to District Officer (Revenue)/District Collector, Sargodha to decide afresh within a month.
